headline: Truist upgrades ServiceNow to Buy on platform advantage, leading AI position
summary: Investing.com -- Truist analysts lifted their rating on ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) shares to Buy from Hold on Thursday as they expect the company to “continue to consolidate the enterprise IT stack,” taking advantage of AI and macro uncertainty to reinforce its positioning relative to peers.
